Posts.EditableText:
The biggest interactive fiction competition has just started the judging period!
https://ifcomp.org/ballot/

You only have to play five games to be a judge and make your opinion count - and there has to be at least five that will tickle your interest - but if you want to do all 71, go for it!

Judging ends middle of November.

Thanks for the notification @Pixie. I'll at least play the one Quest game among the submissions, _I Contain Multitudes_, and see how I feel after that!
